14
15#ifndef ISC_RWLOCK_H
16#define ISC_RWLOCK_H 1
17
18#include <inttypes.h>
19
20/*! \file isc/rwlock.h */
21
22#include <isc/atomic.h>
23#include <isc/condition.h>
24#include <isc/lang.h>
25#include <isc/platform.h>
26#include <isc/types.h>
27
28ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
29
30typedef enum {
31 isc_rwlocktype_none = 0,
32 isc_rwlocktype_read,
33 isc_rwlocktype_write
34} isc_rwlocktype_t;
35
36struct isc_rwlock {
37 /* Unlocked. */
38 unsigned int magic;
39 isc_mutex_t lock;
40 int32_t spins;
41
42 /*
43 * When some atomic instructions with hardware assistance are
44 * available, rwlock will use those so that concurrent readers do not
45 * interfere with each other through mutex as long as no writers
46 * appear, massively reducing the lock overhead in the typical case.
47 *
48 * The basic algorithm of this approach is the "simple
49 * writer-preference lock" shown in the following URL:
50 * http://www.cs.rochester.edu/u/scott/synchronization/pseudocode/rw.html
51 * but our implementation does not rely on the spin lock unlike the
52 * original algorithm to be more portable as a user space application.
53 */
54
55 /* Read or modified atomically. */
56 atomic_int_fast32_t write_requests;
57 atomic_int_fast32_t write_completions;
58 atomic_int_fast32_t cnt_and_flag;
59
60 /* Locked by lock. */
61 isc_condition_t readable;
62 isc_condition_t writeable;
63 unsigned int readers_waiting;
64
65 /* Locked by rwlock itself. */
66 unsigned int write_granted;
67
68 /* Unlocked. */
69 unsigned int write_quota;
70
71};
72
73isc_result_t
74isc_rwlock_init(isc_rwlock_t *rwl, unsigned int read_quota,
75 unsigned int write_quota);
76
77isc_result_t
78isc_rwlock_lock(isc_rwlock_t *rwl, isc_rwlocktype_t type);
79
80isc_result_t
81isc_rwlock_trylock(isc_rwlock_t *rwl, isc_rwlocktype_t type);
82
83isc_result_t
84isc_rwlock_unlock(isc_rwlock_t *rwl, isc_rwlocktype_t type);
85
86isc_result_t
87isc_rwlock_tryupgrade(isc_rwlock_t *rwl);
88
89void
90isc_rwlock_downgrade(isc_rwlock_t *rwl);
91
92void
93isc_rwlock_destroy(isc_rwlock_t *rwl);
94
95ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
96
97#endif /* ISC_RWLOCK_H */
98
